subject: Re: 17th!?
author: JanP
full_text:
Heard the 17th. This is an interesting box, Frank--not your usual. When did you build it? I've not been keeping close tabs on the GBC stuff the last year, so I guess I missed seeing this one. Got any more files from it?

Jan

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Keep getting the 17th, over an over, presumably a date, but what month,
> what year, and even RoboBox answered a question @ 16 seconds
> "seven--teenth---true"., they almost never answer question, and it was a
> surprised to hear something answered on RoboBox.
> 
>  I been getting wormwood and planet x almost constantly if I leave a box on,
> which I just started doing while I work.
> 
> BTW, dropped out for a while, just too damn many psychos in this field,
> mostly on Facebook though.
> 
> F-S
>
